  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* TOP */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  .trailer {
  	position: relative;  
    margin-bottom: 80px;
  }
  .trailer .image {
  	background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center center;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
  }
  .trailer .image.is-active {
  	opacity: 1;
  }
  .trailer .image .coloroverlay {
  	position: absolute;
  }
  .trailer .image .overlay i {
  	position: relative;
  	top: 50%;
  	-webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);

  	-o-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	-ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	transform: translateY(-50%);
  }
  .trailer.padded {
  	padding: 80px 0 0 0;
  }
  .trailer .package-sharp {
  	position: relative;
    z-index: 20;
  	top: 80px;
  }
  .trailer .playback {
  	position: relative;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    height: 0;
    padding-top: 56.25%;
  }
  .trailer .playback img {
  	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
  }
  .bottomshadow:after {
  		content: "";
      width: 98%;
      height: 1px;
      bottom: 0px;
      left: 1%;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      z-index: -1;
  
      -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
         -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
              box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
  }
  
  .trailer .playback a {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
  }
  .trailer .playback a .overlay {
  	opacity: 0;
  	position: absolute;
  	top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 10;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
    background-color: #d10500;
  }
  .trailer .playback i {
  	position: absolute;
  	top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 12;
    color: #FFF;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
  	-webkit-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  	-moz-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  	-o-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  	-ms-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  	transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
  }
  .trailer .playback img {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  .trailer .playback a:hover .overlay {
  	opacity: .5;
  }
  .trailer .playback a:hover i {
  	opacity: 1;
  }
  .trailer .playback a:hover img {
  
  }
  .trailer .playback iframe {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;

    /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    var VHXJS = VHXJS || {};
    
    /* theme js object

    VHXJS = {
      fadebg: 0,
      shopify: "http://tdoslwh.myshopify.com/",
      
      /* initiate
      ---------------------------------------------*/
      init: function() {
       this._setupMailingList();
       //this._setupReadMore();
       //this._adaptBackground();
       this._slideToAnchors();
       //this._setupStickyHeader();
       this._setupTrailers();
       if (VHXJS.shopify){
    	   this._getShopifyItems();
       }
       
      },
      _getShopifyItems: function(){
    
      	$.getJSON(VHXJS.shopify + "products.json?callback=?", function(data){
    	    var thehtml = "";
          var theproducts = data['products'].reverse();
          
        	$.each(theproducts, function(index, val){
    
    				var productlink = VHXJS.shopify+"/products/"+val.handle;
            var productdesc = val.body_html;
    				productdesc = productdesc.replace("<p>&nbsp;</p>","");
            
      			thehtml += "<li>";
            thehtml += "	<div class='package-image text-center'><a href='"+productlink+"' target='_blank'><img src='"+val.images[0].src+"'></a></div>";
            thehtml += "	<div class='package-text'>";
            thehtml += "		<h4 class='text-center'>"+val.title+"</h4>";
            thehtml += "		<div class='actions text-center'>";
            thehtml += "			 <a href='"+productlink+"' target='_blank' class='button'>"+val.variants[0].price+" Buy</a>";              
            thehtml += "		</div>";
            thehtml += "		<div class='desc'>"+productdesc+"</div>";
            thehtml += "	</div>";
            
            thehtml += "</li>";
          });
          $("#shopify").removeClass("is-hidden").find("ul").html(thehtml);
          
        });
        
      },
    
      _setupMailingList: function(){
      	// set source to this location
        $(".mailing-list input[name='subscription[source]']").val(location.href);
    		// vars
        var $all_forms = $('.mailing-list form');
        var $all_form_titles = $('.mailing-list .form-title');
    
    		// email focus
        $('.mailing-list input[type="email"]').focus(function(){
          $all_forms.removeClass("error");
          $all_forms.find("input[type='submit']").prop('disabled',false);
        });
    
         // setup submit button
         $(".submit-on-click").click(function(ev){
           ev.preventDefault();
           $(this).parent("form").trigger('submit');
         });
    
         $all_forms.on('submit', function(ev){
          ev.preventDefault();
    
          var email = $(this).find(".email").val();
          
          // very rudimentary email checking
          if (!email){
            $(this).addClass("error");
            $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Enter a valid email");
          } else {
            var at_location = email.indexOf("@");
            var dot_location = email.indexOf(".",at_location);
            if (at_location < 0 && dot_location < 0){
              $all_forms.addClass("error");
              $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Enter a valid email");
            }
          }
    
          // no errors, proceed to submit data
          if (!$(this).hasClass("error")){
    
            $(this).find('input[type="submit"]').prop('disabled', true);
            $.ajax({
              type: "POST",
              url: $(this).prop('action'),
              crossDomain: true,
              xhrFields: { withCredentials: true },
              data: $(this).serialize(),
              dataType: 'json',
              success: function(){
                $all_forms.fadeOut();
                $all_form_titles.html("Thank you!");
              },
              error: function(){
                $(this).parents(".form").addClass("error");
                $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Please try again");
              }
            });
    
          } // no error
    
         }); // FORM SUBMITS
        // submit form
      },
      _setupReadMore: function(){
        $('.packages .desc').readmore({
          speed: 75,
          maxHeight: 129
        });
      },
      _setupTrailers: function(){
      	// TOP TRAILER AREA PLAY BUTTONS
      	$(".opentrailer").click(function(ev){
      	 ev.preventDefault();
          if ($("body").hasClass("trailer-playing")){
            $(".trailer .playback").html(featurearea);
            $("body").removeClass("trailer-playing");
            $("a.opentrailer")
              .find("span").html("Play Trailer").end()
              .find(".play-icon").removeClass("hidden").end()
              .find(".stop-icon").addClass("hidden");
          } else {
            // save our content
            featurearea = $(".trailer .playback").html();
            var package_id = $(this).data("package-id");
            var embedcode = VHXJS.__generateEmbed(package_id, 1, 0);
            
            $("body").addClass("trailer-playing");
            $(".trailer .playback").html(embedcode);
            $("a.opentrailer")
              .find("span").html("Stop Trailer").end()
              .find(".play-icon").addClass("hidden").end()
              .find(".stop-icon").removeClass("hidden");
          }
     	 });
       
       // MULTIPLE PACKAGES PLAY BUTTON
       $(".showtrailer").click(function(ev){
      		var package_id = $(this).data("package-id");
          var embed_code = VHXJS.__generateEmbed(package_id, 1, 1);
          $(".modal").addClass("is-active").find(".trailer").html(embed_code);
       	  VHXJS.__showBlanket();
       });
      
      },
      __generateEmbed: function(package_id, autoplay, enable_buy){
      	return '<iframe src="https://embed.vhx.tv/packages/'+package_id+'/?autoplay='+autoplay+'&buy_btn='+enable_buy+'" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>';
      },
      __showBlanket: function(){
      	$("#blanket").css({"opacity":0,"display":"block"}).animate({"opacity":.8}, 400, function(){
        	$("#blanket").click(function(ev){
          	VHXJS.__hideModals();
          });
        });
      },
      __hideModals: function(){
      	$("#blanket").hide().css({"opacity":0,"display":"none"});
        $(".modal").removeClass("is-active").find(".trailer").html("");
      },
      _setupStickyHeader: function(){
      	 // sticky, retracting, header
        var myElement = document.querySelector("nav");
        if ($("nav").length > 0){
          var headroom = new Headroom(myElement, {
            "offset": 205,
            "tolerance": 5,
            "classes": {
              "initial": "headroom",
              "pinned": "headroom--pinned",
              "unpinned": "headroom--unpinned"
            }
          });
          headroom.init();
        }
      },
      _slideToAnchors: function(){
      	// slide to anchors
         $('a[href*=#]:not([href=#])').click(function() {
          if (location.pathname.replace(/^\//,'') == this.pathname.replace(/^\//,'') && location.hostname == this.hostname) {
            var target = $(this.hash);
            target = target.length ? target : $('[name=' + this.hash.slice(1) +']');
            if (target.length) {
              $('html,body').animate({
                scrollTop: target.offset().top - 40
              }, 1000);
              return false;
            }
          }
        });
    
      },
      _adaptBackground: function(){
      	// safety check to fade in the bg
    		this.fadebg = setTimeout(function(){ VHXJS._fadeInBG(); }, 3000);
      
      	$.adaptiveBackground.run({
          selector: '#adaptive-bg',
          parent: null,
          normalizeTextColor: false,
          success: function($img, data) {
            $(".coloroverlay").css("background-color",data.color);
            $(".image").addClass("is-active");
          }
    		});
      },
      inArray: function(needle, haystack) {
        var length = haystack.length;
        for(var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
            if(haystack[i] == needle) return true;
        }
        return false;
    	},
      _fadeInBG: function() {
      	$(".image").addClass("is-active");
      },

            var prettyDisplay = monthsArray[themonth] + " " + theday  + ", " + theyear;

            var eventTotal = data.length - 1;

            var eventCounter = 0;
    				var typeArray = [];

            var thehtml = "";        
    
            for (var i=1;i<=data.length-1; i++){
             // 0 = start date

            // SETUP TAGS

             if (listingtype.indexOf(":") > 0){
